sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNT_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, OFFLINE_OPERATION VARCHAR(20), NAME VARCHAR(50), TYPE INTEGER, INDUSTRY INTEGER, OWNER INTEGER, PHONE VARCHAR(30), FAX VARCHAR(30), TICKER VARCHAR(10), OWNERSHIP VARCHAR(20), NUMBER_EMPLOYEES INTEGER, ANNUAL_REVENUE DOUBLE, PRIORITY INTEGER, RATING INTEGER, ADDRESS1 VARCHAR(50), ADDRESS2 VARCHAR(50), CITY VARCHAR(50), STATE VARCHAR(50), ZIP VARCHAR(20), URL VARCHAR(50), NOTES LONGVARCHAR, CURRENT_YEAR_RESULTS NUMERIC, LAST_YEAR_RESULTS NUMERIC, LAST_UPDATED REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CONTACT ( CONTACT_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ACCOUNT_ID INTEGER, MANAGER_ID INTEGER, OFFLINE_OPERATION VARCHAR(20), FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(50), LAST_NAME VARCHAR(50), TITLE VARCHAR(50), OWNER INTEGER, PRIORITY INTEGER, OFFICE_PHONE VARCHAR(30), CELL_PHONE VARCHAR(30), FAX VARCHAR(30), EMAIL VARCHAR(30), ADDRESS1 VARCHAR(50), ADDRESS2 VARCHAR(50), CITY VARCHAR(50), STATE VARCHAR(50), ZIP VARCHAR(20), PICTURE BLOB, NOTES LONGVARCHAR, LAST_UPDATED REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS OPPORTUNITY ( OPPORTUNITY_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ACCOUNT_ID INTEGER, OFFLINE_OPERATION VARCHAR(20), NAME VARCHAR(50), OWNER INTEGER, EXPECTED_CLOSE_DATE REAL, EXPECTED_AMOUNT NUMERIC, PROBABILITY NUMERIC, STATUS INTEGER, LEAD_SOURCE VARCHAR(50), NOTES LONGVARCHAR, LAST_UPDATED REAL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CALENDARITEM ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, START_TIME DATE, END_TIME DATE, SUMMARY TEXT, DESCRIPTION TEXT, OFFLINE_OPERATION VARCHAR(20), LAST_UPDATED REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ACTIVITY ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, CONTACT_ID INTEGER, TYPE VARCHAR(20), PHONE_NUMBER VARCHAR(20), NOTES LONGVARCHAR, START_TIME DATE, END_TIME DATE, OFFLINE_OPERATION VARCHAR(20), LAST_UPDATED REAL)
